title.rendered: “Updates on IDF Casualties and Injuries: Detailed Reports from the Gaza Strip Battles”

content.rendered:
Attached is a message from the IDF spokesperson on the issue of the name of an IDF casualty whose notice was delivered to his family: https://IDFANC.activetrail.biz/ANC1512202319607

Attached is a link to the IDF website, which publishes and updates the details and photos of the fallen:
https://www.idf.il/59780

In addition, a reservist fighter in the Engineering corps 710, “Ram” Brigade 179, was severely injured in a battle in the north of the Gaza Strip. A reservist fighter in Brigade 2855, “Half of the Fire” Brigade 55, was severely injured in a battle in the south of the Gaza Strip.

Also, a reservist officer in the Armored Corps, Brigade 7029, “Ram” Brigade 179, was injured severely in a battle in the south of the Gaza Strip. An officer in Brigade 51, Golan Division, was severely injured in a battle in the north of the Gaza Strip.

The wounded were taken to the hospital, and their families have been updated.
